queries.name: Find all Certificate Templates

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n

queries.name: Find enabled Certificate Templates

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true RETURN n

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n

queries.name: Show Enrollment Rights for Certificate Template

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Template...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n.name
MATCH p=(g)-[:Enroll|AutoEnroll]->(n:GPO {name:$result}) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' return p

queries.name: Show Rights for Certificate Authority

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Authority...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n.name
MATCH p=(g)-[:ManageCa|ManageCertificates|Auditor|Operator|Read|Enroll]->(n:GPO {name:$result}) return p

queries.name: Find Misconfigured Certificate Templates (ESC1)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC1)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true return p

queries.name: Find Misconfigured Certificate Templates (ESC2)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or n.`Any Purpose` = True) RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC2)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or n.`Any Purpose` = True) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Enrollment Agent Templates (ESC3)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or n.`Any Purpose` = True) RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Enrollment Agent Templates from Owned Principals (ESC3)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or n.`Any Purpose` = True or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[r*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') return p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with User Specified SAN (ESC6)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`User Specified SAN` = 'Enabled' RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ManageCa|ManageCertificates*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') RETURN p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with HTTP Web Enrollment (ESC8)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`Web Enrollment` = 'Enabled' RETURN n

queries.name: Find Unsecured Certificate Templates (ESC9)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true  RETURN n

queries.name: Find Unsecured Certificate Templates (ESC9)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and 'NoSecurityExtension' in n.`Enrollment Flag` and n.`Enabled` = true  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Unsecured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC9)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[r*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and g<>n and 'NoSecurityExtension' in n.`Enrollment Flag` and n.`Enabled` = true and NONE(rel in r WHERE type(rel) in ['EnabledBy','Read','ManageCa','ManageCertificates']) return p

queries.name: Domains

queryList.query: MATCH (d:Domain) RETURN d

queries.name: Domain Controllers

queryList.title: Select a Domain Controllers Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-516" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(c:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group {name: $result}) RETURN p

queries.name: High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(h {highvalue: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Computers without LAPS

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {haslaps: false}) RETURN p

queries.name: Owned Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(o {owned: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Sensitive Principals by Keywords

queryList.query: UNWIND ['admin', 'amministratore', 'empfindlich', 'geheim', 'important', 'azure', 'MSOL', 'kennwort', 'pass', 'secret', 'sensib', 'sensitiv'] AS word MATCH (n) WHERE (toLower(n.name) CONTAINS toLower(word)) OR (toLower(n.description) CONTAINS toLower(word)) RETURN n

queries.name: Users with Password in AD

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User) WHERE u.userpassword IS NOT NULL RETURN p

queries.name: Users with "Pass" in AD Description

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User) WHERE u.description =~ '(?i).*pass.*' RETURN p

queries.name: Users with Password not Required

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User {passwordnotreqd: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with Password never Expiring

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User {pwdneverexpires: True}) WHERE NOT u.name starts with 'KRBTGT' RETURN u

queries.name: Users with with Same Name in Different Domains

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User),(u2:User) WHERE split(u1.name,'@')[0] = split(u2.name,'@')[0] AND u1.domain <> u2.domain AND tointeger(split(u1.objectid,'-')[7]) >= 1000 RETURN u1

queries.name: Protected Users

queryList.title: Select a Protected Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-525" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group {name: $result}) RETURN p

queries.name: AdminTo Relationships

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(u {domain: $result})-[r:AdminTo]->(c:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Administrators

queryList.title: Select a Administrators Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-544" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group {name: $result}) RETURN p

queries.name: Computers in Administrators

queryList.title: Select a Administrators Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH "-544" RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (c:Computer)-[r:MemberOf|HasSIDHistory*1..]->(g:Group {name: $result}) RETURN p

queries.name: Computers Local Admin to Another Computer

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p = (c1:Computer {domain: $result})-[r1:AdminTo]->(c2:Computer) RETURN p UNION ALL MATCH p = (c3:Computer {domain: $result})-[r2:MemberOf|HasSIDHistory*1..]->(g:Group)-[r3:AdminTo]->(c4:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Sessions of Administrators on non DCs Computers

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (dc:Computer {domain: $result})-[r1:MemberOf*0..]->(g1:Group) WHERE g1.objectid =~ "S-1-5-.*-516" WITH COLLECT(dc) AS exclude MATCH p = (c:Computer {domain: $result})-[n:HasSession]->(u:User)-[r2:MemberOf*1..]->(g2:Group) WHERE NOT c IN exclude and g2.objectid ENDS WITH "-544" RETURN p

queries.name: DCSync Principals not Administrators

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (admins {domain: $result})-[r1:MemberOf*0..]->(g1:Group) WHERE (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-512") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-516") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-518") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-519") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-520") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-544") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-548") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-549") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-551") WITH COLLECT(admins) AS exclude MATCH p=(n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChanges*0..]->(u:Domain {name: $result}) WHERE NOT n1 IN exclude and (n1:Computer or n1:User) RETURN p

queries.name: AS-REP Roastable Principals

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(u {dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Kerberoastable Principals

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(u {hasspn: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Kerberoastable Administrators

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (admins {domain: $result})-[r1:MemberOf*0..]->(g1:Group) WHERE (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-512") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-516") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-518") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-519") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-520") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-544") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-548") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-549") OR (g1.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-551") WITH COLLECT(admins) AS filter MATCH (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(u {hasspn: true}) WHERE u IN filter RETURN u

queries.name: Constrained Delegations

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (a {domain: $result})-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Constrained Delegations with Protocol Transition (trustedToAuth)

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (a {domain: $result, trustedtoauth: true})-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Computers Allowed to Delegate for Another Computer

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (c1:Computer {domain: $result})-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c2:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Unconstrained Delegation Principals

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (dca)-[r:MemberOf*0..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ "S-1-5-.*-516" OR g.objectid =~ ".*-S-1-5-32-544" WITH COLLECT(dca) AS exclude MATCH p = (d:Domain {name: $result})-[r:Contains*1..]->(uc {unconstraineddelegation: true}) WHERE (uc:User OR uc:Computer) AND NOT uc IN exclude RETURN p

queries.name: Resource-Based Constrained Delegation Principals

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(m)-[r:AllowedToAct]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Configure Resource-Based Constrained Delegation Permissions

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(m)-[r:AddAllowedToAct]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: GPO Permissions of Non-Admin Principals

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (u1:user {domain: $result})-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group) WHERE (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-512") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-516") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-518") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-519") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-520") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-544") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-548") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-549") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-551") WITH COLLECT(u1) AS exclude MATCH p = (u2:User)-[r:AddMember|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink|AllExtendedRights|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|Owns]->(g:GPO) WHERE NOT u2 IN exclude RETURN p

queries.name: LAPS Passwords Readable by Non-Admin

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (u1:user {domain: $result})-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group) WHERE (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-512") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-516") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-518") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-519") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-520") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-544") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-548") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-549") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-551") WITH COLLECT(u1) AS exclude MATCH p = (u2)-[r1:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[r2:GenericAll]->(t:Computer {haslaps:true}) WHERE NOT u2 IN exclude RETURN p

queries.name: LAPS Passwords Readable by Owned Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n {owned: true})-[r1:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[r2:GenericAll]->(t:Computer {haslaps:true}) RETURN p

queries.name: ACLs to Computers (excluding High Value Targets)

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p = (ucg {highvalue: false})-[r {isacl: true}]->(c:Computer {domain: $result}) WHERE (ucg:User OR ucg:Computer OR ucg:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Group Delegated Outbound Object Control of Owned Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n {owned: true})-[r1:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[r2 {isacl: true}]->(t) RETURN p

queries.name: Dangerous Rights for Groups under Domain Users

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=(m:Group {domain: $result})-[r1:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(n) WHERE m.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' RETURN p

queries.name: Set DCSync Principals as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (s)-[r:MemberOf|GetChanges*1..]->(d:Domain) WITH s, d MATCH (s)-[r:MemberOf|GetChangesAll*1..]->(d) WITH s, d MATCH p = (s)-[r:MemberOf|GetChanges|GetChangesAll*1..]->(d) WHERE s.highvalue = false SET s.highvalue = true, s.highvaluereason = 'DCSync Principal' RETURN p

queries.name: Set Unconstrained Delegation Principals as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(uc) WHERE (uc:User OR uc:Computer) AND uc.unconstraineddelegation = true AND uc.highvalue = false SET uc.highvalue = true, uc.highvaluereason = 'Unconstrained Delegation Principal' RETURN p

queries.name: Set Local Admin or Reset Password Principals as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:AdminTo|ForceChangePassword]->(b) WHERE a.highvalue = false SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Local Admin or Reset Password Principal' RETURN a

queries.name: Set Principals with Privileges on Computers as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:AllowedToDelegate|ExecuteDCOM|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner]->(n:Computer) WHERE a.highvalue = false SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Principal with Privileges on Computers' RETURN a

queries.name: Set Principals with Privileges on Cert Publishers as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|MemberOf|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ 'S-1-5-21-.*-517' AND a.highvalue = false SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Principal with Privileges on the Cert Publisher group' RETURN a

queries.name: Set Members of High Value Targets Groups as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE a.highvalue = false AND g.highvalue = true SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Member of High Value Target Group' RETURN a

queries.name: Remove Inactive Users and Computers from High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (uc) WHERE uc.highvalue = true AND ((uc:User AND uc.enabled = false) OR (uc:Computer AND ((uc.enabled = false) OR (uc.lastlogon > 0 AND uc.lastlogon < (TIMESTAMP() / 1000 - 15552000)) OR (uc.lastlogontimestamp > 0 AND uc.lastlogontimestamp < (TIMESTAMP() / 1000 - 15552000))))) SET uc.highvalue = false, uc.nothighvaluereason = 'Inactive' RETURN uc

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain (including Computers)

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (d:Domain) RETURN d.name ORDER BY d.name ASC
MATCH p = allShortestPaths((uc)-[r:{}*1..]->(d:Domain {name: $result})) WHERE (uc:User OR uc:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to no LAPS

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((uc)-[r:{}*1..]->(c:Computer)) WHERE (uc:User OR uc:Computer) AND NOT uc = c AND c.haslaps = false RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from Kerberoastable Users to Computers

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((u:User)-[r:{}*1..]->(c:Computer)) WHERE u.hasspn = true RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from Kerberoastable Users to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((u:User)-[r:{}*1..]->(h)) WHERE u.hasspn = true AND h.highvalue = true RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from Owned Principals (including everything)

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((u:User)-[r:{}*1..]->(a)) WHERE u.owned = true AND u <> a RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from Owned Principals to Domain

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (d:Domain) RETURN d.name ORDER BY d.name ASC
MATCH p = allShortestPaths((o)-[r:{}*1..]->(d:Domain)) WHERE o.owned = true AND d.name = $result RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from Owned Principals to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((o)-[r:{}*1..]->(h)) WHERE o.owned = true AND h.highvalue = true RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from Owned Principals to no LAPS

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((o)-[r:{}*1..]->(c:Computer)) WHERE NOT o = c AND o.owned = true AND c.haslaps = false RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from no Signing to Domain

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (d:Domain) RETURN d.name ORDER BY d.name ASC
MATCH p = allShortestPaths((c:Computer)-[r:{}*1..]->(d:Domain)) WHERE c.hassigning = false AND d.name = $result RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from no Signing to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((c:Computer)-[r:{}*1..]->(h)) WHERE NOT c = h AND c.hassigning = false AND h.highvalue = true RETURN p

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((g:Group)-[r:{}*1..]->(a)) WHERE (g.objectid =~ $domain_users_id OR g.objectid =~ $domain_computers_id) AND g <> a RETURN p

queries.name: List all owned users

queries.name: List all owned computers

queries.name: Find the Shortest path to a high value target from an owned object

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE  g<>n return p

queries.name: Find the Shortest path to a unconstrained delegation system from an owned object

queryList.query: MATCH (n) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m AND n.owned = true RETURN p

queries.name: Find All Users with an SPN/Find all Kerberoastable Users with passwords last set less than 5 years ago

queries.name: Show Wave

nodeSelectQuery.query: MATCH (n) WHERE exists(n.wave) WITH DISTINCT n.wave as d RETURN toString(d) ORDER BY d
nodeSelectQuery.onFinish: OPTIONAL MATCH (n1:User {wave:toInt({result})}) WITH collect(distinct n1) as c1 OPTIONAL MATCH (n2:Computer {wave:toInt({result})}) WITH collect(distinct n2) + c1 as c2 OPTIONAL MATCH (n3:Group {wave:toInt({result})}) WITH c2, collect(distinct n3) + c2 as c3 UNWIND c2 as n UNWIND c3 as m MATCH (n)-[r]->(m) WHERE not(exists(n.blacklist)) AND not(exists(m.blacklist)) AND not(exists(r.blacklist)) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Highlight Delta for Wave

nodeSelectQuery.query: MATCH (n) WHERE exists(n.wave) WITH DISTINCT n.wave as d RETURN toString(d) ORDER BY d
nodeSelectQuery.onFinish: MATCH (n)-[r]->(m) WHERE n.wave<=toInt({result}) AND not(exists(n.blacklist)) AND not(exists(m.blacklist)) AND not(exists(r.blacklist)) RETURN n,r,m

queries.name: Find Clusters of Password Reuse

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory|CanPSRemote*1..5]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Most exploitable paths from owned objects to High Value Targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n {owned:true})-[:MemberOf|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory*1..5]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Next steps (5 hops) from owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((c {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(s)) WHERE NOT c = s RETURN p

queries.name: Unconstrained Delegation systems

queryList.query: MATCH (c {unconstraineddelegation:true}) return c

queries.name: Constrained Delegation systems

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c) RETURN p

queries.name: Unconstrained Delegation systems (without domain controllers)

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2 {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers RETURN c2

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark unconstrained delegation systems as high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2 {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers SET c2.highvalue = true RETURN c2

queries.name: Shortest paths from owned principals to unconstrained delegation systems

queryList.query: MATCH (n {owned:true}) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory|CanPSRemote*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Users with adminCount, not sensitive for delegation, not members of Protected Users

queryList.query: MATCH (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-525" WITH COLLECT (u.name) as protectedUsers MATCH p=(u2:User)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(g2:Group) WHERE u2.admincount=true AND u2.sensitive=false AND NOT u2.name IN protectedUsers RETURN p

queries.name: Groups that contain the word 'admin'

queryList.query: Match (n:Group) WHERE n.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN n

queries.name: Find users that can RDP into something

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintext=True MATCH p1=(u1)-[:CanRDP*1..]->(c:Computer) RETURN u1

queries.name: Find users that belong to high value groups

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintext=True MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN u1

queries.name: Find kerberoastable users

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintext=True AND u1.hasspn=True RETURN u1

queries.name: Return users with seasons in their password and are high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "([Ww]inter.*|[sS]pring.*|[sS]ummer.*|[fF]all.*)" MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN u1

queries.name: Return users with seasons in their password and have local admin on at least one computer

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "([Ww]inter.*|[sS]pring.*|[sS]ummer.*|[fF]all.*)" match p=(u1:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Return users with seasons in their password and a path to high value targets (limit to 25 results)

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "([Ww]inter.*|[sS]pring.*|[sS]ummer.*|[fF]all.*)" MATCH p=shortestPath((u1:User)-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE  u1<>n return u1 LIMIT 25

queries.name: Return users with a variant of "password" in their password and are high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "(.*[pP][aA@][sS$][sS$][wW][oO0][rR][dD].*)" MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN u1

queries.name: Return users with a variant of "password" in their password and have local admin on at least one computer

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "(.*[pP][aA@][sS$][sS$][wW][oO0][rR][dD].*)" match p=(u1:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Return users with a variant of "password" in their password and a path to high value targets (limit to 25 results)

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "(.*[pP][aA@][sS$][sS$][wW][oO0][rR][dD].*)"  MATCH p=shortestPath((u1:User)-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE  u1<>n return u1 LIMIT 25

queries.name: Groups of High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Non Admin Groups with High Value Privileges

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g:Group)-[r:Owns|:WriteDacl|:GenericAll|:WriteOwner|:ExecuteDCOM|:GenericWrite|:AllowedToDelegate|:ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE NOT g.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with Computer and User Objects

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps:Group) WITH groupsWithComps MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps) RETURN DISTINCT(groupsWithComps) as groupsWithCompsAndUsers

queries.name: Groups that can reset passwords (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:ForceChangePassword]->(n:User) RETURN p

queries.name: Groups that have local admin rights (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Users never logged on and account still active

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.lastlogontimestamp=-1.0 AND n.enabled=TRUE RETURN n

queries.name: Users logged in the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Users with passwords last set in the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find if unprivileged users have rights to add members into groups

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {admincount:False}) MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[r:AddMember*1..]->(m:Group)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users a part of the VPN group

queryList.query: Match p=(u:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE toUPPER (g.name) CONTAINS 'VPN' return p

queries.name: Find computers with constrained delegation permissions and the corresponding targets where they allowed to delegate

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE c.allowedtodelegate IS NOT NULL RETURN c

queries.name: Next steps (3 hops) from owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((c {owned: true})-[*1..3]->(s)) WHERE NOT c = s RETURN p

queries.name: Owned users with permissions against GPOs

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true})-[r:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink*1..]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all other Rights Domain Users shouldn't have

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH '-515' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-5-11' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-1-0' RETURN p

queries.name: Computers with administrative Domain Users

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AddMember|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AllowedToDelegate|CanRDP|Contains|ExecuteDCOM|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|GetChanges|GetChangesAll|HasSession|Owns|ReadLAPSPassword|SQLAdmin|TrustedBy|WriteDACL|WriteOwner|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct]->(t) WHERE m.objectsid ENDS WITH '-513' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH '-515' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-5-11' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-1-0' RETURN p

queries.name: List all owned computers

queryList.query: MATCH (m:Computer) WHERE m.owned=TRUE RETURN m

queries.name: List all owned groups

queryList.query: MATCH (m:Group) WHERE m.owned=TRUE RETURN m

queries.name: List all High Valued Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (m) WHERE m.highvalue=TRUE RETURN m

queries.name: List the groups of all owned users

queryList.query: MATCH (m:User) WHERE m.owned=TRUE WITH m MATCH p=(m)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Kerberoastable Users

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN n

queries.name: Find All Users with an SPN/Find all Kerberoastable Users with passwords last set less than 5 years ago

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.hasspn=true AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1825 * 86400)) AND NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u.name, u.pwdlastset order by u.pwdlastset

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable Users with a path to DA

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn:true}) MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = shortestPath( (u)-[*1..]->(g) ) RETURN p

queries.name: Find machines Domain Users can RDP into

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' return p

queries.name: Find what groups can RDP

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:CanRDP]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find groups that can reset passwords (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:ForceChangePassword]->(n:User) RETURN p

queries.name: Find groups that have local admin rights (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users that have local admin rights (Warning Can Be Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users that have local admin rights or Groups (Warning Can Be Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:User)-[r:AdminTo|MemberOf*1..]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all active Domain Admin sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = (c:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(n) return p

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer {unconstraineddelegation:true}) return c

queries.name: Find all computers with unsupported operating systems

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem = '.*(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*' AND H.enabled = TRUE RETURN H

queries.name: Find users that logged in within the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find users with passwords last set within the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find computers that allow unconstrained delegation that AREN’T domain controllers.

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2:Computer {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers RETURN c2

queries.name: Return the name of every computer in the database where at least one SPN for the computer contains the string 'MSSQL'

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE ANY (x IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE toUpper(x) CONTAINS 'MSSQL') RETURN c

queries.name: View all GPOs

queryList.query: Match (n:GPO) RETURN n

queryList.query: Match (n:Group) WHERE n.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN n

queries.name: Find users that can be AS-REP roasted

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Find All Users with an SPN/Find all Kerberoastable Users with passwords last set > 5 years ago

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.hasspn=true AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1825 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Show all high value target's groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Find groups that contain both users and computers

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps:Group) WITH groupsWithComps MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps) RETURN DISTINCT(groupsWithComps) as groupsWithCompsAndUsers

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable users who are members of high value groups

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.highvalue=true AND u.hasspn=true RETURN u

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable users and where they are AdminTo

queryList.query: OPTIONAL MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.hasspn=true OPTIONAL MATCH (u1)-[r:AdminTo]->(c:Computer) RETURN u1

queries.name: Find computers with constrained delegation permissions and the corresponding targets where they allowed to delegate

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE c.allowedtodelegate IS NOT NULL RETURN c

queries.name: Find Users/Groups with direct access to GPOs

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r:AddMember|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink|AllExtendedRights|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|Owns]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Find if any domain user has interesting permissions against a GPO (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User)-[r:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink*1..]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Find if unprivileged users have rights to add members into groups

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {admincount:False}) MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[r:AddMember*1..]->(m:Group)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users a part of the VPN group

queryList.query: Match p=(u:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE toUPPER (g.name) CONTAINS 'VPN' return p

queries.name: Find users that have never logged on and account is still active

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.lastlogontimestamp=-1.0 AND n.enabled=TRUE RETURN n

queries.name: Find an object in one domain that can do something to a foreign object

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n)-[r]->(m) WHERE NOT n.domain = m.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Find all sessions a user in a specific domain has

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(m:Computer)-[r:HasSession]->(n:User {domain:$result}) RETURN p

queries.name: Find an object from domain 'A' that can do anything to a foreign object

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n {domain:$result})-[r]->(d) WHERE NOT d.domain=n.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Find All edges any owned user has on a computer

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((m:User)-[r*]->(b:Computer)) WHERE m.owned RETURN p

queries.name: All Users with a homedirectory

queries.name: All Computers without LAPS - with session

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE c.haslaps = false RETURN p

queries.name: All enabled computers with a description

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer) WHERE c.description =~ '(?i).*.*' RETURN p

queries.name: All enabled computers with a description containing the word file

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer) WHERE c.description =~ '(?i).*file.*' RETURN p

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User) WHERE u.displayname =~ '(?i).*admin*' AND u.enabled = true RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users with passwords set over 720 days ago (23 months)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.enabled=true AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (720 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find all users with passwords set over 1440 days ago (47 months)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.enabled=true AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1440 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find all Domain Admins (nested SID S-1-5-21-.*-512) having a session opened on a domain computer

queryList.query: MATCH (m:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ '(?i)S-1-5-.*-512' WITH m MATCH q=((m)<-[:HasSession]-(o:Computer)) RETURN q

queries.name: Find users that have never logged on and account is still active

queries.name: Find users that haven't logged on in 720 days and account is still active

MATCH p=(m:Group {name:{result}})-[:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Path from DOMAIN USERS to High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((g:Group {name:{result}})-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' return p

queries.name: All Paths from DOMAIN USERS to High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((g:Group {name:{result}})-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) return p

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
match p=(g:Group {name:{result}})-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where NOT c.operatingsystem CONTAINS 'Server' return p

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(g:Group {name:{result}})-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) WHERE c.operatingsystem CONTAINS 'Server' return p

queries.name: Find all other Rights DOMAIN USERS shouldn’t have

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:Owns|:WriteDacl|:GenericAll|:WriteOwner|:ExecuteDCOM|:GenericWrite|:AllowedToDelegate|:ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable Accounts member of High Value Group

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((n:User)-[r:MemberOf]->(g:Group)) WHERE g.highvalue=true AND n.hasspn=true RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable Users with most privileges

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn:true}) OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:AdminTo]->(c1:Computer) OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(:Group)-[:AdminTo]->(c2:Computer) WITH u,COLLECT(c1) + COLLECT(c2) AS tempVar UNWIND tempVar AS comps RETURN u.name,COUNT(DISTINCT(comps)) ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT(comps)) DESC

queries.name: DA Account Sessions to NON DC

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[:MemberOf]->(t:Group) WHERE NOT t.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN CONTROLLERS' WITH c as NonDC MATCH p=(NonDC)-[:HasSession]->(n:User)-[:MemberOf]-> (g:Group) WHERE g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN ADMINS' RETURN p

queries.name: Find unsupported OSs

queries.name: Find AS-REP Roasting users (no kerberos pre-authentication)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN u

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name

MATCH (n:User {domain: $result}),(m:Computer), (n)<-[r:HasSession]-(m) WHERE NOT n.name STARTS WITH 'ANONYMOUS LOGON' AND NOT n.name='' WITH n, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(m)-[r:HasSession]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: List non-privileged user(s) with dangerous permissions to any node type

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (u:User {enabled: true, admincount: false, domain: $result})-[r]->(a) RETURN u, COUNT(DISTINCT type(r)) AS permissions ORDER BY permissions DESC LIMIT 10

queries.name: Route non-privileged user(s) with dangerous permissions to any node type

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name

MATCH (u:User {enabled: true, admincount: false, domain: $result})-[r]->(a) WITH u, COUNT(DISTINCT type(r)) AS permissions ORDER BY permissions DESC LIMIT 10 MATCH p=allshortestpaths((u)-[r]->(a)) WHERE NOT u = a RETURN p

queries.name: [WIP] Users with most cross-domain sessions [Required: sessions]

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name

MATCH p=(g1:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(u:User {enabled:true, domain: $result})<-[r:HasSession]-(c:Computer) WHERE NOT u.domain = c.domain WITH u, count(r) as rel_count order by rel_count desc LIMIT 10 MATCH p=(c:Computer)-[r:HasSession]->(u) WHERE NOT u.domain = c.domain RETURN p ORDER BY c.name

MATCH (a {highvalue: true, domain: $result}) RETURN a

queries.name: List ESC3 vulnerable Certificate Template(s) [Required: Certipy]

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name

MATCH (n:GPO {Enabled:true, type:'Certificate Template', domain: $result}) WHERE (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) RETURN n

queries.name: List ESC4 vulnerable Certificate Template(s) [Required: Certipy]

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner*1..]->(n:GPO {Enabled:true, type:'Certificate Template', domain: $result})) WHERE g<>n RETURN p

queries.name: List ESC6 vulnerable Certificate Template(s) [Required: Certipy]

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (n:GPO {type:'Enrollment Service', `User Specified SAN`:'Enabled', domain: $result}) RETURN n

queries.name: List ESC7 vulnerable Certificate Template(s) [Required: Certipy]

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ManageCa|ManageCertificates*1..]->(n:GPO {type:'Enrollment Service', domain: $result})) WHERE  g<>n RETURN p

queries.name: List ESC8 vulnerable Certificate Template(s) [Required: Certipy]

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (n:GPO {type:'Enrollment Service', `Web Enrollment`:'Enabled', domain: $result}) RETURN n

queries.name: List all cross-domain user session(s) and user group membership(s)

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(g1:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(u:User {enabled:true, domain: $result})<-[:HasSession]-(c:Computer) WHERE NOT u.domain = c.domain RETURN p ORDER BY c.name

queries.name: List privileged user(s) without "Protected Users" group membership

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name

MATCH (u:User {admincount:true, domain: $result}), (c:Computer), (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g) WHERE g.name CONTAINS 'Protected Users' WITH COLLECT(u) AS privilegedUsers MATCH (u2:User {admincount:true}) WHERE NOT u2 IN privilegedUsers RETURN u2

queries.name: List custom privileged group(s)

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name

MATCH (g:Group {admincount:true, highvalue:false, domain: $result}) WHERE NOT (g.objectid =~ $domain_admins or g.objectid =~ $enterprise_admins or g.objectid =~ $administrators or g.objectid =~ $account_operators or g.objectid CONTAINS $replicators or g.objectid =~ $key_admins or g.objectid =~ $read_only_domain_controllers or g.objectid =~ $enterprise_key_admins or g.objectid =~ $schema_admins) RETURN g

queries.name: List all enabled SVC account(s) with privileged group membership(s)

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(u:User {enabled: true, hasspn: true, domain: $result})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group {admincount: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Route all privileged user(s) with sessions to non-privileged computer(s) [Required: sessions]

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH (c:Computer), (u:User), (g:Group), (c)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(:Group {admincount:false}) MATCH p=(c)-[:HasSession]->(u {admincount:true, domain: $result}) RETURN p

queries.name: Find allshortestpaths with dangerous rights to AdminSDHolder object

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=allshortestpaths((u:User {enabled:true, admincount:false, domain: $result})-[*]->(c:Container)) WHERE c.distinguishedname CONTAINS 'ADMINSDHOLDER' RETURN p

queries.name: Find allshortestpaths with DCSync to domain object

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=allshortestpaths((u:User {enabled:true, admincount:false, domain: $result})-[r:MemberOf|DCSync*1..]->(:Domain)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find allshortestpaths with Shadow Credential permission to principal(s)

queryList.title: Select source domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=allshortestpaths((a {domain: $result})-[:MemberOf|AddKeyCredentialLink*1..]->(b)) WHERE NOT a=b RETURN p

queries.name: List all Tenancy (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH (t:AZTenant) RETURN t

queries.name: [WIP] List all AAD Group(s) that are synchronized with AD (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' AND n.azsyncid IS NOT NULL RETURN n

queries.name: [WIP] List all principal(s) used for syncing AD and AAD

queryList.query: MATCH (u) WHERE (u:User OR u:AZUser) AND (u.name =~ '(?i)^MSOL_|.*AADConnect.*' OR u.userprincipalname =~ '(?i)^sync_.*') OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:HasSession]->(s:Session) RETURN u, s

queries.name: List all enabled Azure User(s) (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser {enabled:true}) RETURN u

queries.name: List all enabled Azure User(s) Azure Group membership(s) (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(azu:AZUser {enabled:true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(azg:AZGroup) RETURN p

queries.name: [WIP] List all AD principal(s) with edge(s) to Azure principal(s) (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User)-[r:MemberOf|AZResetPassword|AZOwns|AZUserAccessAdministrator|AZContributor|AZAddMembers|AZGlobalAdmin|AZVMContributor|AZOwnsAZAvereContributor*1..]->(n) WHERE u.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5-21' RETURN p

queries.name: [WIP] List all principal(s) with privileged access to Azure Tenancy (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH (a) WHERE (a:User OR a:AZUser) WITH a MATCH p=(a)-[r:MemberOf|AZGlobalAdmin|AZPrivilegedRoleAdmin*1..]->(azt:AZTenant) RETURN p

queries.name: [WIP] Route all principal(s) that have control permissions to Azure Application(s) running as Azure Service Principals (AzSP), and route from privileged ASP to Azure Tenancy (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH (a) WHERE (a:User OR a:AZUser) WITH a MATCH p=(a)-[:MemberOf|AZOwns|AZAppAdmin*1..]->(azapp:AZApp) OPTIONAL MATCH p2=(azapp)-[:AZRunsAs]->(azsp:AZServicePrincipal) OPTION MATCH p3=(azsp)-[:MemberOf|AZGlobalAdmin|AZPrivilegedRoleAdmin*1..]->(azt:AZTenant) RETURN p, p2, p3

queries.name: [WIP] Route all user principal(s) that have control permissions to Azure Service Principals (AzSP), and route from AzSP to principal(s) (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH (a) WHERE (a:User OR a:AZUser) WITH a MATCH p=allShortestPaths((a)-[*]->(azsp:AZServicePrincipal)-[*]->(b)) WHERE NOT a=b RETURN p

queries.name: [WIP] Route from Azure User principal(s) that have dangerous rights to Azure User and User principal(s) (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH (a) WHERE (a:User OR a:AZUser) WITH a MATCH p=allShortestPaths((u:AZUser)-[*]->(a)) WHERE NOT a=u RETURN p

queries.name: [WIP] Route from principal(s) to Azure VM (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allshortestpaths((a)-[*]->(vm:AZVM)) WHERE NOT a=vm RETURN p

queries.name: [WIP] Route from principal(s) to principal(s) with Global Administrator permissions (Required: azurehound)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(ga)-[:AZGlobalAdmin|AZPrivilegedAdminRole*1..]->(:AZTenant) WHERE (ga:User OR ga:AZUser) WITH ga MATCH p=allshortestpaths((a)-[*]->(ga)) WHERE NOT a=ga RETURN p

queries.name: Find ALL Shortest Paths to Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Find ALL Shortest Paths to Domain Admins - Network

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH p,nodes(p) as nds MATCH q = ((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds WITH p,q,nds,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix RETURN p,q

queries.name: Find ALL Shortest Paths to Domain Admins - Filtered

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH nodes(p) as nds,p MATCH (src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds AND c IN nds WITH p,nds,c,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix WITH p,size(collect(DISTINCT c)) AS total_hosts, size(collect(DISTINCT trgt)) AS total_targets WHERE total_hosts = total_targets + 1 RETURN p

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins - Network

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH nodes(p) as nds,p MATCH q=((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds AND c IN nds WITH p,q,nds,c,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix WITH p,q,size(collect(DISTINCT c)) AS total_hosts, size(collect(DISTINCT trgt)) AS total_targets WHERE total_hosts = total_targets + 1 RETURN p,q

queries.name: Kerberoastable Admins

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectsid =~ $sid WITH n MATCH p=(n)<-[MemberOf*1..]-(m {hasspn: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: All Kerberoastable Users

queryList.query: MATCH (n {hasspn: true}) RETURN n

queries.name: Where can owned users RDP

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:User {owned: true})-[r:MemberOf|CanRDP*1..]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with most local admin rights

queryList.query: MATCH (U:User)-[r:MemberOf|AdminTo*1..]->(C:Computer) WITH U.name as n, COUNT(DISTINCT(C)) AS c RETURN n,c ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 5

queries.name: All Owned Nodes

queryList.query: MATCH (n {owned: true}) RETURN n

queries.name: Find computers with owned Admins

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((n:User {owned:true})-[r:AdminTo|MemberOf*1..]->(c:Computer)) return p

queries.name: Find owned Groups

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {owned: true})-[r:MemberOf]->(g:Group) RETURN g

queries.name: Find owned Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name =~ $name AND n.owned=true WITH n MATCH p=(n)<-[r:MemberOf*1..]-(m) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Shortest Path from owned Node to Domain Admin

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (n:User),(m:Group {name:$result}),p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[r:MemberOf|AdminTo|HasSession|Contains|GpLink|Owns|DCSync|AllExtendedRights|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteDacl|WriteOwner*1..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all other Rights Domain Users shouldn't have

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH '-515' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-5-11' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-1-0' RETURN p

queries.name: Computers with administrative Domain Users

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AddMember|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AllowedToDelegate|CanRDP|Contains|ExecuteDCOM|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|GetChanges|GetChangesAll|HasSession|Owns|ReadLAPSPassword|SQLAdmin|TrustedBy|WriteDACL|WriteOwner|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct]->(t) WHERE m.objectsid ENDS WITH '-513' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH '-515' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-5-11' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-1-0' RETURN p

queries.name: List all high-valued nodes

queryList.query: MATCH (n {highvalue:true}) RETURN n

queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group {owned:true}) RETURN g

queries.name: List all owned users
